item.title: Salsa Dancing
item.description: Starting January 2019 I joined a Salsa class for the first time in my life. Coming from a caribbean country it is one of those things that I am expected to know, and I want to know. However, I never got around to learning. Situations where people asked me to dance where always a source of anxiety for me. Finally this year I decided to overcome my fears and learn. Dancing has become an incredible source of joy!

item.title: Now
item.description: At the moment I am based in Helsinki but traveling quite often to Düsseldorf for work. I am learning to dance salsa at Tanzhaus NRW with Janis and Zoe. I am planning my holiday trip to Brazil in September 2019. I am training for the Dolomyths Skyrace 23km that takes place in Canazei. I finally sign up, 5 years after I discovered the race online.

item.title: About Daniel
item.description: Hi. I am a Software Engineer interested in automation and with a drive to create useful software. I am currently working at Eficode as a Devops Consultant. I live in Helsinki but travel quite often to Düsseldorf. My biggest passions are mountain hiking, storytelling and making useful stuff.
